MAN.TITLE: loadmatfile
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: loads a Matlab 5 MAT-file into Scilab

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : character string containing the path of the file

DESCRIPTION.P: loads a Matlab 5 MAT-file into Scilab. The Matlab data types are converted into the Scilab equivalents.

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer (INRIA)
MAN.BIBLIO: This function has been developped following the "MAT-File Format" description: www.mathworks.com/access/helpdesk/help/pdf_doc/matlab/matfile_format.pdf
